issue.title: [Go] Add Layout method to DataTypes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16556](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16556). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add Layout method to DataType interface to make it easy to confirm the physical layout of a datatype such as the expected number of buffers, types etc. Similar to the C++ layout methods.
